title: "slice bounds out of range error" on highlight multiple hits
body:
Reproduce with:

```
package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "github.com/blevesearch/bleve"
)

func main() {
    // open a new index
    mapping := bleve.NewIndexMapping()
    index, err := bleve.New("example.bleve", mapping)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }

    data1 := struct {
        Name string
    }{
        Name: "PCA PCA",
    }

    data2 := struct {
        Name string
    }{
        Name: "PCA",
    }

    // index some data
    index.Index("id1", data1)
    index.Index("id2", data2)

    // search for some text
    query := bleve.NewMatchQuery("pca")
    search := bleve.NewSearchRequest(query)
    search.Highlight = bleve.NewHighlight()
    searchResults, err := index.Search(search)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    fmt.Println(searchResults)
}
```

Result:

```
panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range
```

Expected:

```
2 matches, showing 1 through 2, took 0
    1. id2 (0.594535)
        Name
                <mark>PCA</mark>
    2. id1 (0.594535)
        Name
                <mark>PCA</mark> <mark>PCA</mark>
```

Works in v0.3.0
